short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: brwsr extension secures web browsing via isolation in the cloud, keeping threats away from your network and devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The brwsr cloud browser delivers Remote Browser Isolation (RBI), securing web browsing via physical isolation, keeping threats away from your network and devices. Almost all successful attacks on users originate from the public internet and many involve web-based attacks. Remote Browser Isolation (RBI) separates end-user internet browsing sessions from endpoints and networks, drastically reducing the web browser attack surface. The brwsr extension enforces your custom isolation policies, making it easy to allow, block or isolate domains and web pages.
